whiterun_jobs.description: Track Thieves Guild operations and jobs in Whiterun
whiterun_jobs.last_updated: 2026-02-01 (Continuity Fix — Aldrin/Aldric Whiterun jobs reset for Khagar Yal)

guild_foothold_whiterun.name: Guild Foothold in Whiterun
guild_foothold_whiterun.description: Establishing a permanent Thieves Guild presence in Whiterun
guild_foothold_whiterun.completion_effect: Permanent Thieves Guild operations established in Whiterun with local fence and safe house access
advancement_triggers: Earn Olfrid's endorsement by aiding Ralof during the Battle of Whiterun (+1; unlock cap)
setback_triggers: Jobs go wrong and attract attention (-1)

gate.note: Olfrid will not fully open the Whiterun door until you prove your alignment during the Battle of Whiterun—specifically by fighting alongside Ralof (or formally allying with the Stormcloaks).

guild_foothold_whiterun.continuity_note: Retired: this clock belonged to Aldrin/Thieves Guild story. Keep as optional module, but it is NOT active for Khagar Yal.

battleborn_strongbox.name: Battle-Born Strongbox Job
battleborn_strongbox.description: Retrieve the iron-banded strongbox from Battle-Born Manor for Olfrid
battleborn_strongbox.completion_effect: Job completed, payment received (250 gold + intel), Guild reputation with Whiterun contacts increased
phases: Phase 0: Gain access to Battle-Born Manor
Phase 1: Locate and breach the concealed wall safe
Phase 2: Extract strongbox from manor grounds
Phase 3: Deliver to Olfrid or arrange hand-off
battleborn_strongbox.continuity_note: Retired: this clock belonged to Aldrin/Thieves Guild story. Keep as optional module, but it is NOT active for Khagar Yal.
